dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: There you are! I was starting to worry. You've been gone for hours.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I'm sorry. I lost track of time. I was... having coffee.

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: Must have been some coffee. You sound different.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Do I? I feel... I don't know how to explain it. Like I've been away for years but also like I never left.

dialogue.speaker: Sarah
dialogue.text: Are you okay? You're worrying me a little.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I'm more than okay. I'm... here. Really here. For maybe the first time.

actions.action: stands at payphone, one foot in ordinary world, one in cosmic understanding
carries new frequencies Sarah can sense but not name
wraps the city in transition, matching Evan's state
bridges two realities through love's recognition

environment.description: Street corner payphone, liminal space between transformation and daily life, love as bridge between states
environment.mood: tender return, integration challenge, love as anchor
